MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Platforms.​IPlatformAccessor
public interface
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Platforms.​IPlatformAccessor
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Platforms.​PlatformAccessorBase

Interface to abstract all accesses made to the underlying platform (OS, framework) by the scripting engine.  Can be used both to support "non-standard" platforms (i.e. non-posix, non-windows) and/or to sandbox the behaviour of the scripting engine.  It's recommended that no class implement IPlatformAccessor directly, and rather extend PlatformAccessorBase.

Functions
FilterSupportedCoreModules
CoreModules FilterSupportedCoreModules(
CoreModules module
)

Filters the CoreModules enumeration to exclude non-supported operations

Parameter
module
CoreModules

The requested modules.

Returns

The requested modules, with unsupported modules filtered out.

GetEnvironmentVariable
string GetEnvironmentVariable(
string envvarname
)

Gets an environment variable. Must be implemented, but an implementation is allowed to always return null if a more meaningful implementation cannot be achieved or is not desired.

Parameter
envvarname
string

The envvarname.

Returns

The environment variable value, or null if not found

bool IsRunningOnAOT()

Determines whether the application is running in AOT (ahead-of-time) mode

Gets the name of the platform (used for debug purposes).

The name of the platform (used for debug purposes)

DefaultInput
string DefaultInput(
string prompt
)

Default handler for interactive line input calls. Can be customized in ScriptOptions.  If a meaningful implementation cannot be provided, this method should return null.

IO_OpenFile
Stream IO_OpenFile(
Script script,
string filename,
Encoding encoding,
string mode
)

A function used to open files in the 'io' module.  Can have an invalid implementation if 'io' module is filtered out.  It should return a correctly initialized Stream for the given file and access

Parameters
script
Script

The script.

filename
string

The filename.

encoding
Encoding

The encoding.

mode
string

The mode (as per Lua usage - e.g. 'w+', 'rb', etc.).

Gets a standard stream (stdin, stdout, stderr).

Parameter

The type.

IO_OS_GetTempFilename
string IO_OS_GetTempFilename()

Gets a temporary filename. Used in 'io' and 'os' modules.  Can have an invalid implementation if 'io' and 'os' modules are filtered out.

OS_ExitFast
void OS_ExitFast(
int exitCode
)

Exits the process, returning the specified exit code.  Can have an invalid implementation if the 'os' module is filtered out.

The exit code.

OS_FileExists
bool OS_FileExists(
string file
)

Checks if a file exists. Used by the 'os' module.  Can have an invalid implementation if the 'os' module is filtered out.

Parameter

The file.

Returns

True if the file exists, false otherwise.

OS_Execute
int OS_Execute(
string cmdline
)

Executes the specified command line, returning the child process exit code and blocking in the meantime.  Can have an invalid implementation if the 'os' module is filtered out.

Parameter

string

The cmdline.
